content.raw:
Thanks for the report and the recent pull request. I just tried this out, and I think the issue is that imu sensors seem to need the `<always_on>` tag set to true.

~~~
diff --git a/test.world b/test.world
index 08fd092..fa4b2b7 100644
--- a/test.world
+++ b/test.world
@@ -49,6 +49,7 @@
           </material>
         </visual>
         <sensor name='imu' type='imu'>
+          <always_on>1</always_on>
           <update_rate>30</update_rate>
           <topic>imu/data</topic>
           <imu/>
~~~

Does that fix it? Maybe we need to change the default behavior or documentation if this wasn't obvious.
